data_table.description: EDIC. Medical history and physical exam of participants with Type 1 diabetes and involved in the "Diabetes Control and Complications Trial (DCCT) and Epidemiology of Diabetes Interventions and Complications Study (EDIC)" project.

variable.name: CLINIC
variable.description: A1. Identifying information: deidentified EDIC clinic number

variable.name: OBO2D
variable.description: O2d. Female/ reproductive: was pregnancy test performed

variable.name: FORM
variable.description: EDIC form number

variable.name: OBCARDAB
variable.description: Q11. Physical examination, cardiovascular examination: other cardiac abnormality

variable.name: OBDMURMR
variable.description: Q11. Physical examination, cardiovascular examination: diastolic murmur

variable.name: OBOMURMR
variable.description: Q11. Physical examination, cardiovascular examination: other murmur

variable.name: OBSMURMR
variable.description: Q11. Physical examination, cardiovascular examination: systolic ejection murmur

variable.name: OBMEGALY
variable.description: Q11. Physical examination, cardiovascular examination, cardiac abnormalities: cardiomegaly

variable.name: OBRHYTHM
variable.description: Q11. Physical examination, cardiovascular examination, cardiac abnormalities: cardiac rhythm

variable.name: OBRUB
variable.description: Q11. Physical examination, cardiovascular examination, cardiac abnormalities: rub

variable.name: OBS3GALP
variable.description: Q11. Physical examination, cardiovascular examination, cardiac abnormalities: S3 gallop

variable.name: OBS4GALP
variable.description: Q11. Physical examination, cardiovascular examination, cardiac abnormalities: S4 gallop

variable.name: OBVENPRS
variable.description: Q11. Physical examination, cardiovascular examination, cardiac abnormalities: venous pressure

variable.name: EDICYEAR
variable.description: EDIC follow-up year

variable.name: FSASDATE
variable.description: A4. Identifying information. Deidentified form date

variable.name: OBMARRY
variable.description: B1a. Demographic and general information: marital status of patient

variable.name: OBMARNO
variable.description: B1b. Demographic and general information: number of times married

variable.name: OBPATJOB
variable.description: B2. Demographic and general information: patient occupation

variable.name: OBSPJOB
variable.description: B2. Demographic and general information: spouse occupation

variable.description: B2. Demographic and general information: mother's occupation

variable.description: B2. Demographic and general information: father's occupation

variable.name: OBFRIJOB
variable.description: B2. Demographic and general information: guardian/friend's occupation

variable.name: OBPATNOJ
variable.description: B2. Demographic and general information: patient unemployed or retired

variable.name: OBSPONOJ
variable.description: B2. Demographic and general information: spouse unemployed or retired

variable.name: OBMOMNOJ
variable.description: B2. Demographic and general information: mother unemployed or retired

variable.name: OBDADNOJ
variable.description: B2. Demographic and general information: father unemployed or retired

variable.name: OBFRINOJ
variable.description: B2. Demographic and general information: guardian/friend unemployed or retired

variable.name: OBPJOBCH
variable.description: B2. Demographic and general information: patient job status changed

variable.name: OBSJOBCH
variable.description: B2. Demographic and general information: spouse job status changed

variable.name: OBMJOBCH
variable.description: B2. Demographic and general information: mother job status changed

variable.name: OBDJOBCH
variable.description: B2. Demographic and general information: father job status changed

variable.name: OBFJOBCH
variable.description: B2. Demographic and general information: guardian/friend's job status changed

variable.name: OBPATED
variable.description: B3. Demographic and general information: patient's education level

variable.name: OBSPOED
variable.description: B3. Demographic and general information: spouse's education level

variable.name: OBMOMED
variable.description: B3. Demographic and general information: mother's education level

variable.name: OBDADED
variable.description: B3. Demographic and general information: father's education level

variable.name: OBFRIED
variable.description: B3. Demographic and general information: guardian/friend's education level

variable.name: OBSMOKE1
variable.description: C1. Smoking status: smoke cigarettes/cigars in past year

variable.name: OBSMOKE2
variable.description: C2. Smoking status: currently smoke cigarettes/cigars

variable.name: OBSMOKE3
variable.description: C3. Smoking status: months since quit cigarettes/cigars

variable.name: OBSMOKE4
variable.description: C4. Smoking status: how many cigarette or cigars in past year

variable.name: OBSMOKE5
variable.description: C5. Smoking status: smoked pipes or cigars in past year

variable.name: OBSMOKE6
variable.description: C6. Smoking status: currently smoke pipes or cigars

variable.name: OBSMOKE7
variable.description: C7. Smoking status: quit smoking pipes or cigars

variable.name: OBSMOKE8
variable.description: C8. Smoking status: pipefuls/cigars per week in past year

variable.name: OBSMOK9A
variable.description: C9a. Smoking status: past 12 months lived where person smoked

variable.name: OBSMOK9B
variable.description: C9b. Smoking status: past 12 months work where person smoked

variable.name: OBDRINK1
variable.description: D1. Drinking status: at least one alcoholic beverage per week

variable.name: OBDRINK2
variable.description: D2. Drinking status: bottles of beer (excluding "light" beer) in last 7 days

variable.name: OBDRINK3
variable.description: D3. Drinking status: bottles of light beer in last 7 days

variable.name: OBDRINK4
variable.description: D4. Drinking status: glasses of wine in last 7 days

variable.name: OBDRINK5
variable.description: D5. Drinking status: hard liquor in last 7 days

variable.name: OBDRINK6
variable.description: D6. Drinking status: total amount of alcohol in last 7 days (or in a typical week exceed 560 grams)

variable.name: OBEXER1
variable.description: E1. Exercise and activity: patient's level of activity

variable.name: OBEXER2
variable.description: E2. Exercise and activity: hours and minutes of light activity

variable.name: OBEXER3
variable.description: E3. Exercise and activity: hours and minutes of moderate activity

variable.name: OBEXER4
variable.description: E4. Exercise and activity: hours and minutes of hard activity

variable.name: OBEXER5
variable.description: E5. Exercise and activity: hours and minutes of very hard activity

variable.description: F4. Diabetes management: describe insulin regimen

variable.description: F5a. Diabetes management: units basal insulin infused daily

variable.name: OBF5B
variable.description: F5b. Diabetes management: different basal rates used/day

variable.name: OBF5C
variable.description: F5c. Diabetes management: technical problems - insulin infusion pump

variable.name: OBF6A
variable.description: F6a. Diabetes management: prescribed change in insulin regimen

variable.description: F6a1. Diabetes management: change dose - symptom. polyuria, polydipsia/nocturia

variable.name: OBF6A2
variable.description: F6a2. Diabetes management: change dose - unacceptable degree hypoglycemia

variable.name: OBF6A3

variable.name: OBF6A5
variable.description: F6a5. Diabetes management: change dose - pregnancy

variable.name: OBF6A6
variable.description: F6a6. Diabetes management: change dose - other

variable.name: OBF7A
variable.description: F7a. Diabetes management: self blood glucose monitoring

variable.name: OBF7B
variable.description: F7b. Diabetes management: frequency per day of self blood glucose monitoring

variable.name: OBF7C
variable.description: F7c. Diabetes management: urine glucose monitoring

variable.name: OBF7D
variable.description: F7d. Diabetes management: frequency per day of urine glucose monitoring

variable.name: OBG1
variable.description: G1. Transfer to inactive status: since last visit - on inactive status

variable.name: OBG1A
variable.description: G1a. Transfer to inactive status: currently on transfer to inactive status

variable.name: OBH1
variable.description: H1. Modifications of follow-up schedule for endpoint: modified follow - up schedule at any time

variable.name: OBH2
variable.description: H2. Modifications of follow-up schedule for endpoint: currently on modified follow - up schedule

variable.name: OBI1A
variable.description: I1a. Diabetes control - answer for all patients: since last visit, completed quarterly telephone interview

variable.name: OBI1B
variable.description: I1b. Diabetes control - answer for all patients: if yes, when was the last quarterly telephone interview held (month/day/year)

variable.name: OBI2A
variable.description: I2a. Diabetes control - answer for all patients: how many times did the patient experience of DKA?

variable.name: OBI2B
variable.description: I2b. Diabetes control - answer for all patients: experience other symptoms hyperglycemia

variable.name: OBI3
variable.description: I3. Diabetes control - answer for all patients: how many days has the patient had moderate or large ketonuria

variable.name: OBI3A
variable.description: I3a. Diabetes control - answer for all patients: unknown number of days of moderate or large ketonuria

variable.name: OBI3AA
variable.description: I3aa. Diabetes control - answer for all patients: how many days has the patient had moderate or large ketonuria? (by change in routine)

variable.name: OBI3B
variable.description: I3b. Diabetes control - answer for all patients: how many days has the patient had moderate or large ketonuria due to illness?

variable.name: OBI3C
variable.description: I3c. Diabetes control - answer for all patients: how many days has the patient had moderate or large ketonuria due to equipment failure?

variable.name: OBI3D
variable.description: I3d. Diabetes control - answer for all patients: how many days has the patient had moderate or large ketonuria? (spontaneous or unexplained)

variable.name: OBI4A
variable.description: I4a. Diabetes control - answer for all patients: number of hospitalizations for hypoglycemia

variable.name: OBI4B1
variable.description: I4b1. Diabetes control - answer for all patients: symptoms of hypoglycemia: lost of consciousness without seizure

variable.name: OBI4B2
variable.description: I4b2. Diabetes control - answer for all patients: symptoms of hypoglycemia: lost consciousness with seizure

variable.name: OBI4C1
variable.description: I4c1. Diabetes control - answer for all patients: symptoms of hypoglycemia: required professional medical help

variable.name: OBI4C2
variable.description: I4c2. Diabetes control - answer for all patients: symptoms of hypoglycemia: require help of another person

variable.name: OBI4C3
variable.description: I4c3. Diabetes control - answer for all patients: symptoms of hypoglycemia: not need doctor or other person

variable.name: OBI4D1
variable.description: I4d1. Diabetes control - answer for all patients: severe hypohlycemia: regency receive glucagon

variable.name: OBI4D2
variable.description: I4d2. Diabetes control - answer for all patients: frequency receive IV glucose

variable.name: OBI4D3
variable.description: I4d3. Diabetes control - answer for all patients: episodes result in injury of patient or others

variable.name: OBI4E
variable.description: I4e. Diabetes control - answer for all patients: history of recurrent hypoglycemia episode resulting in for patient unable to help self

variable.name: OBI4F
variable.description: I4f. Diabetes control - answer for all patients: history of recurrent hypoglycemia episode resulting in (for patient) able to help self

variable.name: OBI4G
variable.description: I4g. Diabetes control - answer for all patients: how many times in the past 7 days did the patient experience mild hypoglycemia? (treat him/herself)

variable.name: OBI4H1
variable.description: I4h1. Diabetes control - answer for all patients: hypoglycemia occur while awake or asleep

variable.name: OBI4H2A
variable.description: I4h2a. Diabetes control - answer for all patients: reason for hypoglycemia; missed meal or snack

variable.name: OBI4H2B
variable.description: I4h2b. Diabetes control - answer for all patients: reason for hypoglycemia; decreased foot intake

variable.name: OBI4H2C
variable.description: I4h2c. Diabetes control - answer for all patients: reason for hypoglycemia; increased exercise level

variable.name: OBI4H2D
variable.description: I4h2d. Diabetes control - answer for all patients: reason for hypoglycemia; too much insulin taken

variable.name: OBI4H2E
variable.description: I4h2e. Diabetes control - answer for all patients: reason for hypoglycemia; lack early warning for low blood glucose
variable.value: Lack early warning for low blood glucose

variable.name: OBI4H2F
variable.description: I4h2f. Diabetes control - answer for all patients: reason for hypoglycemia; other

variable.name: OBI4H2G
variable.description: I4h2g. Diabetes control - answer for all patients: reason for hypoglycemia; unexplained

variable.name: OBI4H3A
variable.description: I4h3a. Diabetes control - answer for all patients: symptoms with hypoglycemia; adrenergic warning

variable.name: OBI4H3B
variable.description: I4h3b. Diabetes control - answer for all patients: symptoms with hypoglycemia; diaphoresis (sweat)

variable.name: OBI4H3C
variable.description: I4h3c. Diabetes control - answer for all patients: symptoms with hypoglycemia; altered mental status

variable.name: OBI4H3D
variable.description: I4h3d. Diabetes control - answer for all patients: symptoms with mild hypoglycemia; other

variable.name: OBI4H3E
variable.description: I4h3e. Diabetes control - answer for all patients: symptoms with mild hypoglycemia; none
